name: ExpressibleByExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteral
desc: A type that can be initialized with a string literal containing a single extended grapheme cluster.

items.name: associatedtype ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType
items.desc: A type that represents an extended grapheme cluster literal.

items.name: init(extendedGraphemeClusterLiteral: Self.ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized to the given value.
